steps-informal.p: How to create a Patient Daily Note in WebPT.

ol.li: Click Display Patients under Patient Manager.
Enter the name or info of the patient in the search bars. Click Search.

Click on the patient.
This displays the patient record. Add Daily Note is preselected in the Patient Record Actions drop-down. Click the drop-down menu to display different options.
Click the arrow icon next to Patient Record Actions.
Enter observations in the Current Complaints / Gains text box in the Subjective tab.
Click the Objective tab and enter observations in the Objective Findings text box.
Scroll down to Direct Timed Codes and enter the amount of time (in minutes) that was spent on each type of treatment in the relevant text boxes.
Click the Assessment tab and enter observations in the Assessment/Diagnosis text box.
Click the Plan tab and enter instructions in the Progressing Patient Next Visit text box. When finished, click Save As Draft.
